Uses of Class
com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.internal.ResettableInputStream

  • Packages that use ResettableInputStream 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.internal  

    • Uses of ResettableInputStream in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.internal

      Methods in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.internal that return ResettableInputStream 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ResettableInputStream ResettableInputStream.newResettableInputStream(File file)
      Convenient factory method to construct a new resettable input stream for the given file, converting any IOException into SdkClientException.
      static ResettableInputStream ResettableInputStream.newResettableInputStream(FileInputStream fis)
      Convenient factory method to construct a new resettable input stream for the given file input stream, converting any IOException into SdkClientException.
      static ResettableInputStream ResettableInputStream.newResettableInputStream(FileInputStream fis, String errmsg)
      Convenient factory method to construct a new resettable input stream for the given file input stream, converting any IOException into SdkClientException with the given error message.
      static ResettableInputStream ResettableInputStream.newResettableInputStream(File file, String errmsg)
      Convenient factory method to construct a new resettable input stream for the given file, converting any IOException into SdkClientException with the given error message.
